meaningMnemonic: Be careful what you <radical>say</radical> in <radical>public</radical>, otherwise you might face a <kanji>lawsuit</kanji>. People will sue you for just about anything these days, so you really need to watch what you say in public, otherwise you might find yourself with a lawsuit on your hands.
readingMnemonic: Any and all <kanji>lawsuit</kanji>s need to be brought before the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (しょう). Oh, you thought you'd get a judge or a jury? Nope, the Shougun decides your fate.
